verbs.description: it still legal to [V: hit] [ARG1: kids in canada] and it should n't be no child deserves to be hit there are things that children do that anger parents or that put the child or others at risk or are socially unacceptable but there is never a reason to hit another human being to discipline or teach what does this mean in plain language it means parents should not be allowed to hit or spank their children truth and reconciliation commission un committee canadian bar association reconciliation commission the huffington post reconciliation committee the commission assault reconciliation commission of canada united nations
